trop_minimum:
theorem list.trop_minimum [linear_order R] (l : list R) : trop l.minimum = List.sum (l.map (trop ∘ coe)) :=
  by
  induction' l with hd tl IH
  · simp
  · simp [List.minimum_cons, ← IH]
#align list.trop_minimum list.trop_minimum
